blankLink.title: Open Link In New Tab
blankLink.titleDesc: Open the following types of links in a new tab in the browser

closeDialogOnClickModal.title: Close Dialog On Clicking Modal
closeDialogOnClickModal.titleDesc: After enabling topic enhancement, for the following types of dialogs, can the dialog be closed by clicking on the surrounding modal layer

dblclickToTop.title: Double Click To Return To The Top
dblclickToTop.titleDesc: Double-click anywhere to return to the top of the webpage

enhancedMsg.title: Enhanced Messages
enhancedMsg.titleDesc: Use more noticeable icons for message notifications and display message list inline

enhancedTopic.title: Enhanced Topic
enhancedTopic.titleDesc: Browse, create, edit and block topics directly on the current page, as well as create and edit replies

floatUserInfo.title: Floating Display Of User Information
floatUserInfo.titleDesc: When the mouse hovers over the user avatar, display basic user information and allow actions such as following and blocking

hideGzkInfo.title: Hide Information
hideGzkInfo.titleDesc: Hide the following types of information in the forum to prevent peeking

smApiKey.title: SM.MS Image Hosting API Key
smApiKey.titleDesc: After configuring the API Key, you can directly upload images in the editor. Click the verify button to test if the API is available

common.emptyData: The query returned no results. Please try again later
common.loadFailedAndRetry: Load failed, please click to retry
common.plzLogin: Please log in to the community before proceeding with the operation

enhancedTopic.alreadyBlockTopic: The topic has already been blocked, please do not repeat the operation
enhancedTopic.cannotReplyByInvalidUser: Not logged in or not bound to a phone number, unable to reply
enhancedTopic.cannotReplyByLockedPost: This post has been locked and cannot be replied to
enhancedTopic.cannotUploadByEmptyApiKey: API Key for the image hosting is not configured, unable to upload pictures. Please click the OK button to view the configuration instructions
enhancedTopic.confirmBlockTopic: Confirm blocking the topic [{title}] ? After blocking, you can go to the extension options page to manage the blocked topic list
enhancedTopic.confirmDeleteAllEditHistory: Are you sure you want to delete all displayed edit history?
enhancedTopic.confirmDeleteEditHistory: Are you sure you want to delete this edit history?
enhancedTopic.confirmImportEditHistory: Importing this edit history will overwrite the current content of the editor. Are you sure you want to continue?
enhancedTopic.confirmUnblockTopic: Are you sure you want to unblock the topic [{title}] ? Refresh the forum after unblocking to take effect
enhancedTopic.haveNotMentionAnyUser: This reply hasn't mentioned any user
enhancedTopic.noReply: No replies yet, what do you think?
enhancedTopic.replyContentCannotBeEmpty: The reply content cannot be empty
enhancedTopic.replyContentIsUnderReview: Reply moderation mode has been enabled on this site. Please wait for the administrator to review the reply content
enhancedTopic.topicContentCannotBeEmpty: The topic content cannot be empty
enhancedTopic.topicContentIsUnderReview: Topic published successfully. Please wait for administrator review
enhancedTopic.topicTitleCannotBeEmpty: The topic title cannot be empty
enhancedTopic.topicTitleLengthLimit: The topic title must be between 3 and 56 characters in length
enhancedTopic.uploadFailed: Upload failed, please press F12 to open the console and view the error message
enhancedTopic.uploadImgMaxNum: Up to {num} images can be uploaded simultaneously
enhancedTopic.uploadImgOnly: Only image files can be uploaded

options.title: Gzker Plus Options
